description: Founded in 2017, Bengaluru-based Ola manufactures e2Ws and certain EV components. The company is developing an EV hub in Krishnagiri and Dharmapuri districts in Tamil Nadu, which includes the Ola Futurefactory, the largest automated e2W manufacturing plan
